title: Deadly Sphere
summaries: The Deadly Sphere is a Hardmode, post-Plantera enemy that spawns during the Solar Eclipse event. Upon spawning, it flies randomly in the direction of the player until it is within close enough proximity while traveling through blocks. Upon noticing the player, the Deadly Sphere grows spikes and begins to spin before rapidly charging toward them indefinitely while attempting to remain directly on top of them. While attacking the player, they are unable to charge through blocks.
